About 1907.

731714f-b.title: Feast of San Rocco [Saint Roch].
731714f-b.text:
(1)
Feast of San Rocco (St. Roch), 1932, No. 7. Paraders, a group of children and others, at 98-100 Bayard Street near the corner of
Baxter Street.
August 16, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
No. 6. A larger view of the same scene, showing an elaborate
candelabrum borne by four young women.
This view shows the end of western end of Bayard Street, at
Baxter Street.
August 16, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.  AEG 3441
(3)
No. 9. A group of children who have been in the procession.
Notice the number of angels.
August 16, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
